com.datastax.driver.mapping

Interface HierarchyScanStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHierarchyScanStrategy, MappedClassesOnlyHierarchyScanStrategy

    public interface HierarchyScanStrategy
    A strategy to determine which ancestors of mapped classes should be scanned for mapped properties.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Class<?>> filterClassHierarchy(Class<?> mappedClass)
      Computes the ancestors of the given base class, optionally filtering out any ancestor that should not be scanned.

    • Method Detail

      • filterClassHierarchy

        List<Class<?>> filterClassHierarchy(Class<?> mappedClass)
        Computes the ancestors of the given base class, optionally filtering out any ancestor that should not be scanned.

        Implementors should always include mappedClass in the returned list.

        Parameters:
        mappedClass - The mapped class; this is necessarily a class annotated with either @Table or @UDT.
        Returns:
        the list of classes that should be scanned, including mappedClass itself and its ancestors, ordered from the lowest (closest to mappedClass) to the highest (or farthest from mappedClass).
